strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<se_low>*: What are you doin' back here? Want me to give you a puff-puff, do ya?
<se_low>*: But it's a nice gesture anyway. Cheers!
<se_low>*: Hu hu huh. I was only jokin', of course!
<se_low>*: Hu hu huh. Nudge, nudge, wink, wink!
<se_low>*: No need to say a word! I know why you're here!
<se_low>*: Go on through to the next room and get yourself nice an' ‘refreshed’!
<se_low>*: You just have to promise one thing...
<se_low>*: No touchin' the merchandise, right!? Hu hu huh!
